channel.title: CVE Feed for Vova Anokhin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Vova Anokhin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23800|2024-08-02T10:42:26.254Z -- vova%20anokhin -- wp%20shortcodes%20plugin%20%E2%80%94%20shortcodes%20ultimate
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Vova Anokhin WP Shortcodes Plugin — Shortcodes Ultimate.This issue affects WP Shortcodes Plugin — Shortcodes Ultimate: from n/a through 5.12.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-25040|2024-08-02T11:11:44.059Z -- vova%20anokhin -- wordpress%20shortcodes%20plugin%20%E2%80%94%20shortcodes%20ultimate
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Vova Anokhin WordPress Shortcodes Plugin — Shortcodes Ultimate plugin <= 5.12.6 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-25050|2024-08-02T11:11:43.847Z -- vova%20anokhin -- shortcodes%20ultimate
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Vova Anokhin Shortcodes Ultimate allows Absolute Path Traversal.This issue affects Shortcodes Ultimate: from n/a through 5.12.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-25050|2024-06-04T17:18:46.596Z -- vova%20anokhin -- shortcodes%20ultimate
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Vova Anokhin Shortcodes Ultimate allows Absolute Path Traversal.This issue affects Shortcodes Ultimate: from n/a through 5.12.6.
